item.description:
Our "Speed Chinese" seemed to be a good success last time though we still need some practice to get the flow right ;) 

We're going to try it again!  Short 1-1 conversations to get everyone talking and listening and have a chance to talk to lots of people.  ALL LEVELS WELCOME!!!  This format is probably even better suited to beginners so please don't hesitate to join us!!

Our next evening meet up will be

LOCATION: Borders Books store in downtown boston (Take the T to downtown boston, www.mbta.com.)  

TIME: from 6:30 to 8:30PM. Food and drinks available here.

NOTE: Some people often head over to C-town for dinner as a group afterwards.  All are welcome to join us so If you have any interest in that please make sure to have enough cash to cover yourself.

Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group. All levels are welcome.

Please RSVP responsibly. Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs in the cafe, probably have chinese books on the table.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Wednesday evening chinese/english language exchange group
